Patrons.Text: A {Gender} {Race} with a {Distinguishing feature}. Currently {Current state}, behaving {Personality}.

Personality.Text: Friendly, looking for a good time

Obstacle.Text: Antilife aura with a radius of [[1d10 * 10]] ft.; while in the aura, living creatures can't regain hit points
Battering winds reduce speed by half, impose disadvantage on ranged attack rolls
Chasm [[1d4 * 10]] ft. wide and [[2d6 * 10]] ft. deep, possibly connected to other levels of the dungeon
Flooding leaves [[2d10]] ft. of water in the area; create nearby upward-sloping passages, raised floors, or rising stairs to contain the water

Bridge.Text: , with a stone bridge crossing it

Obstacle.Text: Overgrown mushrooms block progress and must be hacked down{Hazard}

Hazard.Text: - a mold or fungus dungeon hazard is hidden among them

Obstacle.Text: Poisonous gas (deals [[1d6]] poison damage per minute of exposure)
Reverse gravity effect causes creatures to fall towards the ceiling

Object.Text: Runes engraved on wall or floor

Effect.Text: Ages the first person to touch the object
The touched object animates, or it animates other objects nearby
Asks three skill-testing questions (if all three are answered correctly a reward appears)
Bestows resistances or vulnerability
Changes a character's alignment, personality, size, appearance, or sex when touched
Changes one substance into another, such as gold to lead or metal to brittle crystal
Creates a force field
Creates an illusion
Suppresses magic items for a time
Enlarges or reduces characters
Magic mouth speaks a riddle
Confusion (targets all creatures within 10 ft.)
Gives directions (true or false)
Grants a wish
Flies about to avoid being touched
Casts geas on the characters
Increases, reduces, negates, or reverses gravity
Induces greed
Contains an imprisoned creature
Locks or unlocks exits
Offers a game of chance, with the promise of a reward or valuable information
Helps or harms certain types of creatures
Casts polymorph on the characters (lasts 1 hour)
Presents a puzzle or riddle
Prevents movement
Releases coins, false coins, gems, false gems, a magic item, or a map
Releases, summons, or turns into a monster
Casts suggestion on the characters
Wails loudly when touched
Talks (normal speech, nonsense, poetry and rhymes, singing, spellcasting, or screaming)
Teleports characters to another place
Swaps two or more character's minds
Magic missiles shoot from a statue or object
Collapsing staircase creates a ramp that deposits characters into a pit at its lower end`
Ceiling block falls, or entire ceiling collapses
Ceiling lowers slowly into locked room
Chute opens in floor
Clanging noise attracts nearby monsters
Touching an object triggers a disintegrate spell
Door or other object is coated with contact poison
Fire shoots out from wall, floor, or object
Touching an object triggers a flesh to stone spell
Floor collapses or is an illusion
Vent releases {Hazard} gas
Floor tiles are electrified
Glyph of warding
Huge wheeled statue rolls down corridor
Lightning bolt shoots from wall or object
Locked room floods with water or acid
Darts shoot out of an opened chest
A weapon, suit of armor, or rug animates and attacks when touched (see 'Animated objects' in the Monster Manual)
Pendulum, either bladed or weighted as a maul, swings across the room or hall
Hidden pit opens beneath characters{Hazard}

Hazard.Text: - a black pudding fills the bottom of the pit
- a gelatinous cube fills the bottom of the pit

Effect.Text: Hidden pit floods with acid or fire
Locking pit floods with water
Scything blade emerges from wall or object
Spears (possibly poisoned) spring out
Brittle stairs collapse over spikes
Thunderwave knocks characters into a pit or spikes
Steel or stone jaws restrain a character
Stone block smashes across hallway
Symbol
Walls slide together
